programme.desc: Sushi Ko: Akira and Lisa are losing up to $20,000 a month at their sushi restaurant in California. Can Gordon piece the family back together and save the restaurant?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Thanksgiving Decoupling: Howard takes the gang to his mother's house for Thanksgiving to protect himself from his grumpy father-in-law who has also been invited.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Discovery Dissipation: Sheldon feels guilty when he gets attention for his accidental discovery of a new element. Raj stays with Howard and Bernadette for a week.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Cooper Extraction: Sheldon has to go back to Texas when his sister goes into labour. While he's away, the gang gather at the flat to decorate the Christmas tree.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Hesitation Ramification: Penny's big TV acting break hits the cutting-room floor, so Leonard does his best to comfort her, which leads her to ask him a bold question.

programme.title: Playing with Fire
programme.desc: (2019) Fun-filled family comedy starring John Cena. A macho fireman has to babysit three impish kids after saving them from a blaze in the remote California woodlands.

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog
programme.desc: (2020) Madcap adventure-comedy video game adaptation with Jim Carrey and Ben Schwartz. Can nippy ring-chasing hedgehog Sonic escape the clutches of an evil, moustachioed scientist?

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Sales Call Sublimation: Penny gets more than she bargained for when Leonard meets a psychiatrist, while Sheldon and Raj make an astronomical discovery.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Empathy Optimization: The gang plan a Sheldon-free weekend in Las Vegas after coping with his constant demands, rudeness and ingratitude when he was ill.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Meemaw Materialization: Sheldon is thrilled when his beloved grandma 'Meemaw' comes to visit, but his excitement fades when she butts heads with Amy.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Valentino Submergence: Sheldon and Amy host a special live Valentine's Day episode of their internet show Fun with Flags. Leonard and Penny grapple with getting older.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Positive Negative Reaction: When Bernadette makes a big announcement, Howard becomes convinced that he needs to start earning more money.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Celebration Experimentation: The gang persuade Sheldon to celebrate his birthday and invite a few special guests along to his party, in the 200th episode.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Application Deterioration: Leonard, Sheldon and Howard run into problems when they file for a patent. Emily reaches out to Raj after their break-up.

programme.title: Independence Day
programme.desc: (1996) Blockbusting landmark sci-fi action-thriller starring Will Smith and Jeff Goldblum. A US Air Force pilot and a scientist battle aliens who are spectacularly destroying our planet.

programme.title: Celebrity Gogglebox
programme.desc: The celebrities watch: This Morning, Dating Around, Mission: Impossible - Rogue Nation, Hostile Planet, Big Brother: Best Shows Ever, EastEnders and The Repair Shop.

programme.title: Celebrity Gogglebox
programme.desc: The celebrities watch 127 Hours, Planet Earth II, Cape Fear, This Morning on public toilets, EastEnders, Bradley Walsh & Son: Breaking Dad, and BBC News on beaches.

programme.title: Celebrity Gogglebox

programme.title: Jackass Forever
programme.desc: (2022) Outrageous adult comedy with Johnny Knoxville. The Jackasses reunite to test if older really is wiser by inflicting more playfully real pain on each other - just for fun of course.

programme.title: First Dates
programme.desc: Helicopter pilot Paul, who's also a cross-dresser, embarks on his first date in women's clothing. 'Sexy geeks' Hannah and Dan bond over video games and shared insecurities.

programme.title: Celebrity Gogglebox

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Laureate Accumulation: When their academic competitors charm America on a publicity tour, Sheldon and Amy try to get some Nobel laureates on their side.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Inspiration Deprivation: Amy has a meltdown when she feels the pressure of what it would mean for women everywhere if she were to win a Nobel Prize.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Returns 2: Gordon Ramsay revisits two restaurants - Giuseppi's and Sante La Brea - to find out whether his advice has been put to good use.

programme.title: Hollyoaks Omnibus
programme.desc: An unexpected present sends the Hutchinsons' Christmas into turmoil. Jack has an extra-special mission up his sleeve. And while the sparkle fades for Mercedes, Theresa's wish is granted.

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Lido Di Manhattan: Ambitious graduate Lisa bought her restaurant in California at just 23 but, five years later, she's worried she picked the wrong venture. Can Gordon help?

programme.title: Ramsay's Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Mama Rita's: Gordon tries to bring new ideas to Mama Rita's Mexican restaurant in Newbury Park, southern California.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Bitcoin Entanglement: Sheldon seeks revenge when the guys cut him out of a potentially valuable investment. A secret about Leonard and Penny is revealed.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Confidence Erosion: Sheldon and Amy try to use maths to make their wedding planning less stressful. Raj falls out with Howard.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The Celebration Reverberation: Sheldon and Howard plan birthday celebrations for Amy and Halley. Leonard is stressed by a Christmas letter from his brother.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Snowman
programme.desc: Raymond Briggs's classic animated tale of a little boy's snowman who comes to life and whisks him off to the North Pole for an adventure.

programme.title: The Snowman and the Snowdog

programme.title: Mog's Christmas

programme.title: The Great Christmas Bake Off 2025

programme.title: Secret Headquarters

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons Movie

programme.title: New: The Simpsons

programme.title: News
programme.desc: The leading news stories of the moment.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Dead...
programme.desc: ...Reckoning: (2023) Tom Cruise returns as Ethan Hunt and jumps a motorbike off a mountain for real. There's some stuff about an all-powerful AI. But it's the thrills that we're here for!

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: (1983) Al Pacino stars in Brian De Palma's classic crime thriller. A Cuban immigrant uses the cocaine trade to take what he wants of the American dream. Say hello to my little friend.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Little Women
programme.desc: (2019) Greta Gerwig's Oscar-winning period drama adaptation of the classic Louisa May Alcott novel, starring Emma Watson, Saoirse Ronan, Florence Pugh, Timothe Chalamet and Meryl Streep.

programme.title: Romancing the Stone
programme.desc: (1984) Comedy action adventure starring Michael Douglas and Kathleen Turner. An adventurer helps a bestselling author to search for her sister, who's been kidnapped in Colombia.

programme.title: Tora! Tora! Tora!
programme.desc: (1970) Oscar-winning drama portraying the bombing of Pearl Harbor, from both American and Japanese perspectives. With Joseph Cotten and So Yamamura.

programme.title: Hunter Killer
programme.desc: (2018) Nautical action thriller. Gerard Butler stars as an unconventional submarine skipper sent to investigate the torpedoing of a US vessel. With Gary Oldman, Linda Cardellini and Common.

programme.title: Plane
programme.desc: (2023) Action thriller starring Gerard Butler as an airline pilot who must become a one-man army after crashlanding on an island overrun by bad guys. To survive, he's gonna have to wing it.

programme.title: Late Night with the Devil
programme.desc: (2023) Unsettling found-footage horror with David Dastmalchian. A has-been host tries to save his 70s talk show using a demonically possessed 13-year-old girl. Really, what could go wrong?

programme.title: Carlito's Way
programme.desc: (1993) Brian De Palma's crime thriller with Al Pacino. An ex-con, fresh out of jail, flamboyantly declares his plan to go straight. But his criminal past just won't let him go...

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Muppets from Space
programme.desc: (1999) The Muppets are back in another feature-length adventure as Gonzo, convinced that he is of alien origin, struggles to communicate with his family in outer space.

programme.title: Tooth Fairy
programme.desc: (2010) Family fantasy comedy. Dwayne Johnson stars as a tough ice hockey player who is transformed into a real-life fairy as punishment for telling a child that tooth fairies don't exist.

programme.title: My Spy
programme.desc: (2020) Family action comedy. A CIA agent (Dave Bautista) gets the run-around from a nine-year-old girl when he's sent to keep an eye on her family. With Chloe Coleman.

programme.title: One Million Years B.C.
programme.desc: (1966) Raquel Welch - in her famous fur bikini - stars in this prehistoric adventure set in an inhospitable landscape populated by two warring tribes and Ray Harryhausen's roving dinosaurs.

programme.title: The League of Extraordinary...
programme.desc: ...Gentlemen: (2003) Fantasy with Sean Connery. In an alternative Victorian age, can Allan Quatermain, Dorian Gray, Captain Nemo, Mina Harker and the Invisible Man avert a war?

programme.title: The Banshees of Inisherin
programme.desc: (2022) Colin Farrell and Brendan Gleeson star in writer and director Martin McDonagh's award-winning tragicomedy about the end of a life-long friendship on a very small island. Awkward.

programme.title: The Hunt
programme.desc: (2020) Fighty, satirical horror that upset Donald Trump. Hilary Swank plays a rich lefty who likes hunting working class people to the death. But she didn't reckon on Betty Gilpin.

programme.title: The Worst Person in the World
programme.desc: (2021) Romantic drama. A young woman grapples with her desires. Will her search for the perfect life leave her missing out? In Norwegian/subs. Adults only: strong language/sex/drugs/nudity.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: LumoTV: Fairytale of London Town: Drama
programme.desc: In this modern fairytale, three deaf women's lives are thrown together just in time for Christmas.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Teleshopping.

programme.title: The Borrowers
programme.desc: (1997) Family fantasy comedy-adventure starring Jim Broadbent and Celia Imrie. A family of miniscule people live beneath the floorboards of a regular-sized family's house.

programme.title: The Muppets Take Manhattan
programme.desc: (1984) It's time to put on make-up. It's time to light the lights. Kermit, Miss Piggy, Fozzy, the Blues one and the gang embark on a musical adventure as they try to make it on Broadway.

programme.title: Evolution
programme.desc: (2001) Scary sci-fi comedy. Can David Duchovny, Julianne Moore and Orlando Jones save humanity from a rapidly evolving, predatory alien species? Well, DD used to be Fox Mulder, so...

programme.title: The Day the Earth Stood Still
programme.desc: (2008) Remake of the sci-fi classic with Keanu Reeves. An alien visits Earth to tell humankind to stop destroying the planet. But when he's attacked, he decides to eradicate us instead...

programme.title: Fisherman's Friends: One and All
programme.desc: (2022) Sea-shanty-singing comedy sequel with James Purefoy. The band are on tour but it's not all plain sailing. The label want Jim to replace his dead dad and Leadville just ain't woke.

programme.title: Deadpool 2
programme.desc: (2018) Ryan Reynolds returns as the potty-mouthed, can of whup-ass-opening superhero and now he's got buddies to help him take on baddie Josh Brolin in the all-out action comedy sequel.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Fallout
programme.desc: (2018) Tom Cruise stars in part six of the action-thriller series. His mission: to stop terrorists from getting their hands on nuclear bombs and unleashing global devastation.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Dead...
programme.desc: ...Reckoning: (2023) Tom Cruise returns as Ethan Hunt and jumps a motorbike off a mountain for real. There's some stuff about an all-powerful AI. But it's the thrills that we're here for!

programme.desc: (1983) Al Pacino stars in Brian De Palma's classic crime thriller. A Cuban immigrant uses the cocaine trade to take what he wants of the American dream. Say hello to my little friend.
